Tape Dispenser with Smart Sensing Technology: The tape dispenser could be equipped with sensors that can detect when the tape is running low and automatically reorder it from a connected device.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Cutting Tool: The tape dispenser could have a built-in cutting tool that allows users to easily cut the tape to the desired length.
Tape Dispenser with Adhesive Strength Indicator: The tape dispenser could have an indicator that shows the strength of the adhesive, allowing users to choose the right tape for the job.
Tape Dispenser with Multiple Tape Types: The tape dispenser could have multiple rolls of different types of tape, allowing users to switch between them easily.
Tape Dispenser with Voice Control: The tape dispenser could be equipped with voice control technology, allowing users to dispense tape without having to touch it.
